title: Ticket #7878: Make kubernetes manifests part of the release process
description:
"How do I run a collector on Kubernetes?" has come up a few times.

In fact, Greg started a bit of this here:

https://github.com/htcondor/htcondor/tree/master/build/docker/k8s

as part of HTCondor Week 2020. However, it could use some love:

  1. Appears to be completely undocumented. There's no place in the manual where you could learn of this.
  2. Doesn't seem to be part of the release process - that is, this currently points at the 8.9.6 release tags despite 8.9.8 being the latest release.
creator: bbockelm
